name: Barbell Bench Press
column9: Retract shoulders; drive through feet; lead with chest

name: Chest Fly (Dumbbell)
description: Arc motion with slight elbow bend
cues: Slight bend in elbows; feel the stretch

name: Dips (Chest Bias)
description: Lean forward slightly for chest bias
cues: Lean forward; go deep but controlled

name: Pull-Up
description: Full pull to chin over bar

name: Lat Pulldown
cues: Lean slightly back; pull to upper chest

name: Barbell Bent Row
description: Hinge and row to lower ribs
cues: Hinge at hips; bar close to shin

name: One-Arm Dumbbell Row
demo_url: Pull elbow to hip; brace core

name: T-Bar Row
cues: Drive with elbows; keep torso tight

name: Inverted Row
cues: Keep body straight; squeeze shoulder blades

name: Barbell Overhead Press
cues: Brace core; press in straight line

name: Lateral Raise
cues: Slight elbow bend; lead with pinky

name: Seated Machine Shoulder Press
cues: Adjust seat so handles at ear level

name: Upright Row
cues: Pull with elbows; don't jerk shoulders

name: Triceps Rope Pushdown
cues: Spread rope at bottom; lock elbows

name: Split Squat
cues: Knee in line; drive with front heel

name: Romanian Deadlift
cues: Hinge at hips; feel hamstring stretch

name: Conventional Deadlift
cues: Bar close; chest up; brace core

name: Farmer Carry
description: Weighted carry for grip and core

name: Kettlebell Swing
cues: Snap hips; don't squat the swing

name: Step-Up
cues: Drive through heel of working foot

name: Cable Hip Abduction
cues: Avoid torso lean; lead with hip

name: Pendlay Row
cues: Explosive from floor; reset each rep

name: Snatch Grip Deadlift
description: Wide grip DL for upper back

name: Smith Machine Squat
cues: Feet placement matters; control bar path

name: Russian Twist
cues: Rotate from torso; keep feet down/up

name: Superman
cues: Lift chest and legs; squeeze glutes

name: Zercher Squat
cues: Hold bar in crook; keep chest up

name: Isometric Wall Sit
cues: Back flat to wall; low position

name: Windmill
cues: Hinge and rotate; eyes on weight

name: Bench Step-Up
cues: Drive through heel of working leg

name: DB Lateral Lunge
cues: Push hips back; keep torso upright
